thread.title: The Internet Lost It Over That Chair Lean in Beyoncé's Grammys Performance
thread.title_full: The Internet Lost It Over That Chair Lean in Beyoncé's Grammys Performance

author: Laura Marie Meyers
title: The Internet Lost It Over That Chair Lean in Beyoncé's Grammys Performance
text:
Reactions to Beyonce's 2017 Grammys Performance The Internet Lost It Over That Chair Lean in Beyoncé's Grammys Performance February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 The Internet Lost It Over That Chair Lean in Beyoncé's Grammys Performance 
If you got anxious when you watched Beyoncé tip back in her chair during her epic Grammys performance , you weren't the only one. Beyoncé was sitting in a chair set on top of a table when she started to slowly dip back, and for a second there, hearts stopped as it looked like she ( and her twins !) might fall. Beyoncé and her magical chair appeared to defy gravity, though, like only Queen Bey could, and fans took to Twitter to share their hilarious reactions to the moment.
